data.eml:eml: Synopsis of Falsocis Pic (Coleoptera, Ciidae), new species, new records and an identification key

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano, Lawrence, John F. (2011): Synopsis of Falsocis Pic (Coleoptera, Ciidae), new species, new records and an identification key. ZooKeys 145: 59-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.145.1895, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.145.1895
